Resource Profile: CCG CARD type - Stop Activity (Medication Order)

Official URL: https://profiles.ihe.net/QRPH/CCG/StructureDefinition/ccg-card-stoprx Version: 1.0.0
Active as of 2025-10-02 Computable Name: CCG_Stop_Activity_Medication_Order

The role of this type of CCG CARD is to create a Task that, upon being processed, will “stop” a patient’s presently active MedicationRequest (i.e. set status to stopped).

Usages:

  • Examples for this Profile: ExampleCARDstoprx

You can also check for usages in the FHIR IG Statistics
